eu.wauz.wauzcore.skills

Class Castable

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.skills.Castable

  • public class Castable
extends java.lang.Object
    A skill or similar, that can be casted through a quick slot.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
